Label.en: Anyway... another key reason for its fame: The Hunchback of Notre-Dame!
Label.fr: En tout cas, une autre chose la rendu célèbre : 'Notre-Dame de Paris' (The Hunchback of Notre-Dame pour les anglais) !
Label.es: Anyway... another key reason for its fame: The Hunchback of Notre-Dame!
Label.zh: Anyway... another key reason for its fame: The Hunchback of Notre-Dame!

Label.en: Both the book by Victor Hugo in 1831... and the later Disney adaptation!
Label.fr: Le livre de Victor Hugo publié en 1831... puis ensuite l'adaptation de Disney !
Label.es: Both the book by Victor Hugo in 1831... and the later Disney adaptation!
Label.zh: Both the book by Victor Hugo in 1831... and the later Disney adaptation!

Label.en: Lots of interesting events have happened to it, too!
Label.fr: Beaucoup de choses intéressantes s'y sont produites également !
Label.es: Lots of interesting events have happened to it, too!
Label.zh: Lots of interesting events have happened to it, too!

Label.en: Napoleon the I was crowned there... like in this 1807 painting by Jaques-Louis David!
Label.fr: Napoléon Ier y fût sacré empereur... lors d'une cérémonie réprésentée sur cette peinture de Jaques-Louis David achevée en 1807 !
Label.es: Napoleon the I was crowned there... like in this 1807 painting by Jaques-Louis David!
Label.zh: Napoleon the I was crowned there... like in this 1807 painting by Jaques-Louis David!

Label.en: And Philippe Petit walked between the towers in 1971
Label.fr: Dans un autre registre,  Philippe Petit se promena entre les tours en 1971
Label.es: And Philippe Petit walked between the towers in 1971
Label.zh: And Philippe Petit walked between the towers in 1971

Label.en: But the Cathedral's history hasn't all been happy!
Label.fr: Mais l'histoire de la cathédrale ne fût pas toujours joyeuse !
Label.es: But the Cathedral's history hasn't all been happy!
Label.zh: But the Cathedral's history hasn't all been happy!

Label.en: But the Cathedral's history hasn't all been happy!
Label.fr: Mais l'histoire de la cathédrale ne fût pas toujours joyeuse !
Label.es: But the Cathedral's history hasn't all been happy!
Label.zh: But the Cathedral's history hasn't all been happy!
